description: From everyday +‎ -ness. Compare the similarly-formed German Alltäglichkeit (alltäglich + -keit).

entries.meaning: (uncountable) The quality or state of happening every day, or frequently.
examples: ... brings tranquilized self-assurance... into the average everydayness of Dasein.

entries.meaning: (countable) The product or result of happening every day, or frequently.
